cause.description:
The United Africa Society is a student organisation dedicated to bringing the countries of Africa together, combating genocide, promoting African loyalty and comradeship in a largely westernised community.
1. Aid to the current crisis zones in Africa
2. Promote a proudly African mentality
3. To unite Africa's countries and her people
cause.mission: To raise funds and awareness regarding the on-going atrocities in Darfur.
cause.name: United Africa Society
